name: TradeWinds
description:
A GameJam entry for Brackeys Jam 2020.2 (Theme: REWIND)

In a very loose interpretation of the theme, this game has you controlling the wind. You must redirect the lost ships back to port! This short and relatively simple puzzle game was made to test out Godot as a game engine. I hope you enjoy!

Special thanks to Codat on YouTube for the cool water tutorial, and Quaternius for the free 3D models!
